       a.apply_bar_code,
       a.product_code,
       a.receive_date,
       a.apply_status_code,
       a.saledeptcode,
       a.frequency,
       a.prem_period,
       case
         when b.product_code is not null then
          a.preprem * b.rate
         when a.product_code in ('111702', '111801', '121704', '121705') then
          a.preprem * 0.25
         when a.product_code = '111405' and a.prem_period = 0 then
          a.preprem * 1.1 * least((80 - a.applicant_age) * 0.05, 1) * 0.1
         when a.product_code = '121514' and a.prem_period = 0 then
          a.preprem * 1.2 * least(a.cover_period * 0.05, 1) * 0.1
         when a.product_code = '121514' and a.prem_period <> 0 then
          a.preprem * 1.2 * least(a.cover_period * 0.05, 1) *
          (a.prem_period / 10)
         when a.product_code = '111204' and a.prem_period = 0 then
          a.preprem * 1.1 * least(a.cover_period * 0.05, 1) * 0.1
         when a.product_code = '111204' and a.prem_period <> 0 then
          a.preprem * 1.1 * least(a.cover_period * 0.05, 1) *
          (a.prem_period / 10)
         when a.product_code = '111301' and a.prem_period >= 10 and
              a.prem_period <= 19 then
          a.preprem * 0.60
         when a.product_code = '111301' and a.prem_period >= 20 then
          a.preprem * 1.44
         else
          0
       end y1012
  from (select a.policy_no policy_no, --保单号码
               a.print_no apply_bar_code,
               b.risk_code product_code, --险种代码
               case
                 when a.designated_effective_date is not null then

                 else

               end receive_date, --预收日期

               e.managecom saledeptcode, --  管理机构代码  
               b.payment_schedule frequency, -- 缴费频率
               case

                  999
                 when b.payment_period_unit is null then
                  0
                 else

               end prem_period, --交费年期  
               case
                 when b.is_insure_whole_life = 'y' then
                  999
                 else
                  b.insure_period_value
               end cover_period, -- 保险期间 
               trunc(months_between(to_date(a.created_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),
                                    to_date(f.birthday, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) / 12) applicant_age,
               b.initial_premium / 100 preprem --微投规模保费
        
          from hx_fyb.t_application_main a

            on a.transaction_no = b.transaction_no

          left join hx_nogg.laagent e
            on a.sales_agent = e.agentcode
         where 1 = 1
           and a.sales_channel in ('02', '05', '06') -- 营销渠道
           and exists (select 1
                  from tmp_lyb_yxfyb_zb1_wt tmp
                 where a.transaction_no = tmp.transaction_no
                   and tmp.rn = 1)) a
